transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji sir.

Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan sir boliye.
Customer: Haan Sandeep sir Ajay baat karta IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ajay bhai yaar mera address kaun change kiya isme?
Executive: Address ka woh jo keh rahe the na woh abhi update toh hai jo aapke GST pe hai. Same as it is.
Customer: Are par hum log Ahmedabad se toh likha hua pehle se hai jab GST nahi tha tab se.
Executive: GST pe total address kya tha aapka?
Customer: Woh Baroda branch ka hai.
Executive: Alag hai woh? Haan haan Baroda. Hmm.
Customer: Toh apna Ahmedabad wala chal raha tha woh abhi change kar diya toh aise thoda bina bole karta hai.
Executive: Ek minute, ek minute. Aap mujhe Ahmedabad wala karke dijiye nahi toh phir aage renewal hum log nahi karenge sir.
Executive: Dekhiye jo purana wala aapka tha na yeh Vadodara Gujarat ka tha, theek hai? Ab naya wala aap keh rahe hain ki update hua hai.
Customer: Ahmedabad wala tha.
Executive: Pehle Ahmedabad wala tha?
Customer: Haan woh branch hai hamara.
Executive: Udhar se toh main check kiya.
Customer: Ab aap date karke toh main aapko mail bhi toh kiya tha return aapko. Nahi mila tha kya?
Executive: Ek minute, ek minute. Yeh GST wala hai ki woh hai?
Customer: PAN card wala ho gaya kya ab?
Customer: Ji?
Customer: PAN card mein toh teesra address aur hai.
Executive: Kyun aapke?
Customer: Jo GST pe aapka updated hai, ek baar GST wala mujhe bhejenge kya naya jo PDF rehta hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi hai sahab hum logo ko kyun aap samajh nahi rahe?
Executive: Kya cheez?
Customer: GST wala address nahi rakhna hai hume jo hamara Ahmedabad ka branch address chal raha tha woh rakhna hai continue.
Executive: Toh woh thodi ho payega sir jo GST wala address rahega wohi hum dikha paate hain, dusra address nahi dikha paate hain usme.
Customer: Sahab GST mein bataiye na toh phir aage renewal mein mat aaiye.
Executive: Toh usko GST wala toh aapko change karana padega tab jaakar hum yahan pe aapka change kar payenge.
Customer: Haan ek state mein kitna GST de sakte hain aap bataiye na.
Executive: Ek state mein kitna de sakte hain.
Executive: Ek minute, inko samjhaiye ek baar main senior.

Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Haan sunna, namaskar sir. Isme na IndiaMART par aise hota hai system ki
Customer: Suniye na, yeh system aap mujhe mat dikhaiye. Hum logo ne jab register kiya na sir, meri baat suniye aap pehle.
Customer: Suniye aap.
Customer: Suniye ji abhi. Haan sun raha hun bataiye.
Customer: Dekhiye, hum logo ne kareeb 12 saal Ahmedabad wala address 12 bhi 14 saal ke aas paas Ahmedabad jo hamara original hai woh branch pe hum log business kar rahe hain. Usi ka sab kuch karna hoga.
Customer: Achanak se abhi abhi yeh do chaar mahine mein koi hamara address change kar diya, barabar hai?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Toh hamare paas GST toh pura ek hi hoga na branch bolega toh.
Customer: Toh hum Ahmedabad wale customer ko kya dikha rahe hain ki Baroda mein hai toh jo aa rahe the woh bhi abhi bol rahe hain ki Baroda mein ja raha hai.
Customer: Toh phir Ahmedabad ka update hoke aayega ki nahi aayega khali itna bata dijiye. Jo 13 saal, 14 saal tak hamara chala na us hisab se. Agar nahi aana toh bol dijiye ki nahi aayega khali aap apne upar jo bhi management se baat karna hai karke bataiye. Na GST hai na GST woh hai na GST toh abhi aaya hai. Hum log pehle se hi kaam kar rahe hain.
Customer: Par hamara branch hai toh mujhe woh aap mention kar dijiye.
Executive: Haan toh aapka branch hai woh agar aapko mention karana hai apne site pe IndiaMART ki toh woh mention ho jayega, woh problem nahi hai.
Customer: Haan toh hum pehle wala jaisa jo tha woh kar dijiye GST mein jo hai woh usme mention kar dijiye ki GST yahan par hai aur yeh.
Executive: Dekho main abhi isme kya kar sakta hun main bata deta hun. Aap main aapko WhatsApp kara deta hun, aap mere ko Ahmedabad wala address jo hai woh bhej dijiye. Main aapke additional place of business mein Ahmedabad wala address aur person ka naam aur koi mobile number aap bata do main woh add karwa deta hun. Jismein ki aapke IndiaMART ke page pe aapka Vadodara ke saath saath Ahmedabad wala address bhi buyer ko dikh sakta hai. Pehla option, theek hai? Yeh ho jayega. Dusra, ab aap chahte hain maan lijiye ki Vadodara wala hat jaye aur Ahmedabad wala hi aa jaye toh uske
Customer: Vadodara nahi dikhega na toh bhi chalega.
Executive: Aisa keh rahe hain aap? Filhaal Vadodara primary address hai. 13-14 saal tak Vadodara humko nahi dikhaya ki nahi hai. Hame Vadodara kuch nahi chahiye. Hame Ahmedabad wala dikhaiye.
Executive: Ahmedabad wala dikhane ke do hi option hain. Pehla ki ya toh isko main Ahmedabad wale address ko aapke additional place of business mein add kar deta hun, head office ya main office bana ke IndiaMART ki site pe. Toh woh koi bhi buyer aapka site open karega toh usko Ahmedabad wala address bhi dikh jayega. Pehla option. Dusra aapne sahi bola ki Gujarat mein GST ek hi hoga, address ek hi hoga jo already aap mil aap Vadodara ka le chuke ho, theek hai? Ab GST mein ek option aata hai jo aapke shayad CA ko pata hoga additional place of business add karane ka. Ki bhai aapka jo business hai woh Vadodara ke saath saath Ahmedabad mein bhi hai. Toh woh aap agar GST mein main address change nahi hoga, GST mein additional address add ho sakta hai.
Customer: Woh GST mein additional address humne likh ke diya hai, Pune ka bhi hai hamara, Jaipur mein bhi hai, Indore ka bhi hai woh sab likh ke diya hai par woh time lagega. GST mein likha hua hai?
Executive: Toh woh GST mein likhe hue hain yeh saare address?
Customer: Aayega. Toh ek baar GST certificate pe puchna hai.
Customer: Apna GST office hai na wahan par likh ke diya hua hai.
Executive: Toh woh abhi update ho gaya hai ki abhi pending hai?
Customer: Na woh pending hai, woh bol rahe hain ki cheh aath mahina lagega kyunki Pune ka hai. Usme aap log branch dikha rahe hain. Toh wahan ka aayega aur yeh mention hoga. Toh pura update hoga. Indore mein MC ka lagta hai.
Executive: Haan bilkul. Isliye woh GST abhi liya hai toh uska process chal raha hai. JCPD se aa gaya hai woh update karega yeh. Toh yeh hum bol rahe hain ki teen chaar mahine lagega zyada nahi lagega aapko.
Executive: Theek hai toh bherhaal aap ek kaam kariye phir. Main Ajay ko bol raha hun woh aapko WhatsApp dal raha hai. Aap mujhe Ahmedabad wala jo address hai woh WhatsApp pe dal dijiye pehla aur aapka yeh Deva ka jo GST certificate hai teen page wala woh dal dijiye. Ek baar main aage baat karke aapko call back karta hun. Filhaal aap
Customer: Toh sahab meherbani hoga aapka abhi pura dhandha chaupat ho gaya hai yaar aapki wajah se. Apne aap yeh update kar lete ho phir hum log phass jaate hain abhi toh jaan mein do teen din reh gaya hai. Main toh apne aap toh mera computer system isliye karta hai na kyunki woh toh protocol ke hisab se wohi address leke chalega jo GST pe aapka hai. Ab woh aapka badla hoga woh aap mujhe bataiye. Aaj se yeh 15 saal se hai aur IndiaMART mein 15 saal se wohi address chal raha tha aur nahi chahiye main kya bol raha hun. Kam se kam mujhse baat karna chahiye na. Aap malik ko bhi seedha seedha doge toh malik ko bolna chahiye na ki bhai inki nahi hai general order.
Executive: Woh baat toh samajh gaya woh protocol inka change jo hoga tabhi inhone badla bhi hai. Aap bherhaal GST certificate aur Ahmedabad wala address WhatsApp kar dijiye. Main ek baar aage baat karke aapko wapas se connect karta hun.
Customer: Karwaiye sahab baat karke seedha seedha hai aage phir hum log nahi judenge aapke phir mujhe agar isme mera bahut bada loss hua hai malum hai. Customer bhaag jayenge na aur unko na dikhe toh phir hamare liye koi kaam kaaj nahi na itna paisa dalna.
Executive: Haan nahi bilkul sahi. Aap filhaal bhejiye toh main baat karta hun aage. Main usko bol raha hun message kar raha hai bhejiye usko.
Customer: Main theek hai karwata hun.
summary:
Concerns:

- Address changed from Ahmedabad to Baroda.

- Wants Ahmedabad address to be displayed.

- Business is suffering due to address change.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to add Ahmedabad address.

- Executive asked for GST certificate and Ahmedabad address.

- Executive will investigate and call back.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to send documents via WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- address change, gst, business, ahmedabad, vadodara
